content: Write a paragraph with every word starting with the letter 's'.

Sure, here's a paragraph where every word starts with the letter 's':

"Softly, silently, snowflakes swirled, settling softly on sleeping streets. Serene scenes surfaced, stirring sentiments sweetly. Suddenly, a streak shot swiftly, startling slumbering sparrows. Startled, they scattered, soaring skyward, seeking safety in soaring heights. Soon, silence settled again, save for soft sighs of the swirling snowstorm."
